member.name: M:BitFlex.Internal.EmployeeStore.ContainsEmployee(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a System.Boolean value indicating whether the specified employee(s) exist in the data source
member.param: The first name of the employee
The last name of the employee
Optional: the middle initial of the employee
member.returns: Returns true if one or more employees matching the specified information exist, otherwise returns false

member.name: M:BitFlex.Internal.EmployeeStore.ContainsUser(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a System.Boolean value indicating whether the specified user exists in the data source
member.param: The UserID of the user to check for
member.returns: Returns true if the user exists, otherwise returns false

member.name: M:BitFlex.Internal.EmployeeStore.CreateEmployee(BitFlex.Internal.Linq.Employee)
member.summary: Adds the specified employee object to the data source
member.returns: Returns true if the employee was created, otherwise returns false
